jot.ai

Class AbstractAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.ai.AbstractAgent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Agent

    public abstract class AbstractAgent
extends Object
    Abstract class that each A.I. agent must implement.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes
